instructions: Change the height of the white rectangle between yellow and grey from 8 pixels to 4 pixels:  `rect(0, 211, 174, 4);`
Change the height of the red rectangle between white and black from 8 pixels to 4 pixels: `rect(174, 259, 87, 4);`
Change the height of the top-right white rectangle from 259 pixels to 263 pixels:  `rect(174, 0, 87, 263);`
